list.subject: Java version
list.content: Used version 8 to utilize functional interface for stream processing and bi-functions features.
Used version 17 to utilize record class(JDK 14) for immutable object data, enhanced switch statement, and sealed classes for extend restriction.

list.subject: Spring Boot MVC
list.content: Implemented API endpoint services to handle user requests with Filters.
Experienced JSP with JSPS to support both frontend and backend services.

list.subject: JDBC template, JPA, HQL, Hibernate, Jooq
list.content: Implemented API endpoint services to handle user requests
Used JDBC for simple data fetch operation with prepared statement(parameterized query) to prevent SQL injection.

list.subject: Spring Cloud Gateway API
list.content: Incorporated Resilience4j's rate limiter and bulkhead features to prevent DoS attack
Implemented circuit breaker to prevent cascading failovers

list.subject: Spring Boot MCV
list.content: Implemented API endpoint services to handle user requests

list.subject: numpy
list.content: For a project involving complex numerical computations or operations on large data sets, Numpy will allow efficient processing with its robust multi-dimensional arrays and matrices facilities. It's a core component in projects requiring high-performance mathematical computations.

list.subject: pygame
list.content: If you are creating an interactive video game or multimedia application, Pygame provides a collection of robust modules to handle graphics, sound, and other core multimedia functionality. A solid choice for any game development project.

list.subject: matplotlib
list.content: In any project where data visualization is critical, Matplotlib is a great choice. It allows you to generate a wide range of static, animated, and interactive plots in a few lines of code, turning raw data into meaningful insights.

list.subject: jupyter notebook
list.content: For any data-driven project, the Jupyter Notebook provides a comprehensive environment that combines live code, rich-text documentation, visualizations and other multimedia resources. It's perfect for prototyping, exploratory data analysis and documentation of the data processing pipeline.

list.subject: pandas
list.content: For a project that involves manipulating and analyzing large datasets, the Pandas library provides versatile data structures like DataFrames and Series, which makes it easy to manipulate data in a structured and tabulated manner.

list.subject: Scrapy
list.content: In a project aimed at collecting data from the web, Scrapy will serve as a high-performance spidering tool. Scrapy offers easy ways to extract structured information from web pages, making it ideal for scraping a large number of websites.

list.subject: Requests
list.content: If your application or project requires easy and reliable HTTP requests, the Requests library in Python makes this process smooth and straightforward. It will be valuable in projects requiring sophisticated communication with web services.

list.subject: OpenCV
list.content: In a project focusing on computer vision or image processing, OpenCV will stand as the core engine. It provides functionalities for real-time image and video processing, object detection, and even machine learning models geared towards vision tasks.

list.subject: Beautiful Soup
list.content: For projects where parsing and extracting information from HTML and XML documents is necessary, Beautiful Soup simplifies the task by transforming complex documents into a tree of Python objects. It's a very valuable tool in web scraping projects.

list.subject: Maven
list.content: Used maven to improve spring projects package management

list.subject: Gradle
list.content: Used gradle to improve spring projects package management
